quote-text: When someone is crying, of course, the noble thing to do is to comfort them. But if someone is trying to hide their tears, it may also be noble to pretend you do not notice them.
quote-source:
Lemony Snicket (via fairestregal)

This is important.

(via goddessgretchen)

Sometimes the best way to be there for somebody, is to allow them to pretend like they donât need you there in the first place.

(via thejunglenook)
